definition: open to argument or debate, a hypothetical case that law students argue as an exercise, think about carefully
details:
adjective
- open to argument or debate
= example: open to argument or debate
= synonyms: debatable
- of no legal significance (as having been previously decided)
noun
- a hypothetical case that law students argue as an exercise
= example: a hypothetical case that law students argue as an exercise
verb
- think about carefully
= synonyms: deliberate, debate, consider, turn over
